name: Suck, Suck, Ghost
description:
You get another call to go to a spooky mansion for a paranormal job. Over there, it's business just like usual. Get around  from room to room, dispatching ghosts into your pack. Oh, & make sure to exit through the rope on the roof. 

CONTROLS: 

Move around with WASD or the Arrow Keys

Hold down the mouse to suck up ghosts into your pack

CREDITS:

FryDev: Code & art

TinyWorlds: Font (Thaleah Fat)

8-Bit Betty: Music (Spooky Loop)
